welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Oak Creek! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Oak Creek."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for domestic flights and is home to several airlines including Southwest and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is primarily used for international flights and is home to airlines such as Air Canada and Volaris.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal serves all commercial flights at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal handles private and corporate flights at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
